mapper.select: select * from RemoteConfigParam where envid=#{envid} order by updateTime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RemoteConfigParam(`name`, `value`, envid, `comment`, author,`type`,`platform`, `updateTime`) VALUES(#{name},#{value},#{envid},#{comment},#{author},#{type},#{platform}, STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4))
INSERT INTO RemoteConfigParam(`name`,`value`,envid,`comment`,`author`, `type`,`platform`) SELECT `name`,`value`,#{0},`comment`,#{1},`type`,`platform` FROM RemoteConfigParam a WHERE a.envid = #{2};
